Unearthed these at the local flea market. First time up for sale, would prefer to sell individually or smaller lots but am open to any reasonable offers on the whole group. Cards are low grade "Fair" due to staining and overall wear but no real paper loss, tears, or writing. Plz add $3 s/h but 2 or more will ship for free.

Hal Chase (White Cap) Sweet Cap $ SOLD
Leifield  Sov. 350 $SOLD
Hoffman Sov. 350 $ SOLD

Karger Sweet Cap $SOLD Ships 8/10
Hoblitzell Sov. 350 $ SOLD
Manning Sov. 350 $17 via PWE
Perring Sov. 350 $ SOLD
Abbaticcio Sov. 460 $SOLD
